messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SC conference/was:MHEA Maryland Conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/2/03 12:33:08 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Tell him to forget the word conference .  That makes it sound like you sit in a room and are
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/2/03 12:33:08 AM Eastern Standard Time,
stephanie.elms@... writes:

> Hubby is thinking about making it into a road trip (I am still
> trying to convince him that the conference would be fun too, but we will
> see...he just keeps rolling his eyes...)
>
>

Tell him to forget the word "conference". That makes it sound like you sit
in a room and are trapped for an hour listening to someone. It is so much
more fun than that. It is like getting together with a bunch of friends.
Doing fun things and listening to interesting people. Socializing and
learning.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
